segments.text: I'm done . Can I watch TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's some water . Take these multi-vitamins and Tylenol .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh ! I can't swallow them , Mom !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to take them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here , I'll break them up , so they're smaller . And here's some cough syrup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , it tastes horrible . But it'll make you feel better . Try holding your nose . It won't taste as bad .
segments.speaker: S2
